# ManipulationComponent.InputDevice.Kind.Set

**Structure**

An efficient set of input device kinds.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Set
```

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a set of input device kinds containing only the specified input device kind.

## Type Properties

- **all**: A set of all available input device kinds.
- **directPinch**: A pinching hand in close proximity to content.
- **indirectPinch**: An indirectly targeted pinching hand.
- **pointer**: A click-based, indirect input device.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- Hashable
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
